extends Object
    The Class CameraManager.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlanarYUVLuminanceSource buildLuminanceSource(byte[] data, int width, int height)
      A factory method to build the appropriate LuminanceSource object based on the format of the preview buffers, as described by Camera.Parameters.

      This method will set the view finder view frame starting point X & Y coordinates, width & height.

      Closes the camera driver if still in use.

      Gets the CameraManager singleton instance.

      This method will customize the view finder frame dimension.

      Like getFramingRect() lbut coordinates are in terms of the preview frame, not UI / screen.

      Initializes this static object with the Context of the calling Activity.

      Opens the camera driver and initializes the hardware parameters.

      Asks the camera hardware to perform an autofocus.
      void requestPreviewFrame(Handler handler, int message)
      A single preview frame will be returned to the handler supplied.

      Registers an instance of ICameraEventListener to receive callbacks during camera events such as camera open, start preview, stop preview, release.
      void startPreview()
      Asks the camera hardware to begin drawing preview frames to the screen.
      void stopPreview()
      Tells the camera to stop drawing preview frames.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(Context context)
        Initializes this static object with the Context of the calling Activity.
        Parameters:
        context - The Activity which wants to use the camera.

      • get

        public static CameraManager get()
        Gets the CameraManager singleton instance.
        Returns:
        A reference to the CameraManager singleton.

      • changeViewFinderFrameDimension

        public void changeViewFinderFrameDimension(int startX,
                                  int startY,
                                  int frameWidth,
                                  int frameHeight)
                                    throws PaydiantClientException
        This method will set the view finder view frame starting point X & Y coordinates, width & height.
        Parameters:
        startX - Stating point X coordinate
        startY - Stating point Y coordinate
        frameWidth - Frame width
        frameHeight - Frame height
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • openDriver

        public void openDriver(SurfaceHolder holder,
              CameraConfigParameters cameraConfigParameters)
                throws PaydiantClientException
        Opens the camera driver and initializes the hardware parameters.
        Parameters:
        holder - The surface object which the camera will draw preview frames into.
        cameraConfigParameters - TODO
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • closeDriver

        public void closeDriver()
        Closes the camera driver if still in use.

      • startPreview

        public void startPreview()
                  throws PaydiantClientException
        Asks the camera hardware to begin drawing preview frames to the screen.
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - containing any errors occurred.

      • stopPreview

        public void stopPreview()
        Tells the camera to stop drawing preview frames.

      • requestPreviewFrame

        public void requestPreviewFrame(Handler handler,
                       int message)
        A single preview frame will be returned to the handler supplied. The data will arrive as byte[] in the message.obj field, with width and height encoded as message.arg1 and message.arg2, respectively.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to send the message to.
        message - The what field of the message to be sent.

      • requestAutoFocus

        public void requestAutoFocus(Handler handler,
                    int message)
        Asks the camera hardware to perform an autofocus.
        Parameters:
        handler - The Handler to notify when the autofocus completes.
        message - The message to deliver.

      • getFramingRect

        public Rect getFramingRect()
                    throws PaydiantClientException
        This method will customize the view finder frame dimension.
        Returns:
        the framing rect
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • getFramingRectInPreview

        public Rect getFramingRectInPreview()
        Like getFramingRect() lbut coordinates are in terms of the preview frame, not UI / screen.
        Returns:
        the framing rect in preview

      • buildLuminanceSource

        public PlanarYUVLuminanceSource buildLuminanceSource(byte[] data,
                                            int width,
                                            int height)
        A factory method to build the appropriate LuminanceSource object based on the format of the preview buffers, as described by Camera.Parameters.
        Parameters:
        data - A preview frame.
        width - The width of the image.
        height - The height of the image.
        Returns:
        A PlanarYUVLuminanceSource instance.

      • setCameraEventListener

        public void setCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener cameraEventListener)
        Registers an instance of ICameraEventListener to receive callbacks during camera events such as camera open, start preview, stop preview, release.
        Parameters:
        cameraEventListener - instance of ICameraEventListener. Setting a null value will deregister the event listener.
        Since:
        4.4.0.3
        See Also:
        ICameraEventListener, ITokenManagementService.setCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener)
